title: Type Controller for mac
content:
Hello all interested readers,

I would like to inform you about the next MAC application:

[Download here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143151/http:/www.haagseletters.nl/Typecontroller_Haagseletters.zip),

It's an application based on [www.haagseletters.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143151/http:/www.haagseletters.nl/ "www.haagseletters.nl")

The standalone application features export to PDF, so you can play with the output and use it in other software. The PDF files will be exported to the folder: PDF in your HD root.

Hope you will enjoy this release.

I am currently scripting PDF output for the webversion ( [www.haagseletters.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014143151/http:/www.haagseletters.nl/ "www.haagseletters.nl"))
author: Joshua_Koomen
